preview.html: The appearance of the stars varies depending on the position of the stars in the sky, and the dream varies according to their colors, as seeing white and blue stars indicates the coming of goodness, joy, living, and happiness. The interpretation of seeing stars also varies according to the social status of the visionaries, and this is explained in detail in this encyclopedia article, in addition to specifying the interpretation of seeing stars and their colors. First: Interpretation of dreams of stars: their colors: Dream interpreters interpreted seeing stars that turn white as evidence of joy and happiness after being exposed. To a deep state of sadness. It is a state of tension, anxiety, fear, and nervousness. Likewise, the stars. The white star shows the strong personality of the person with the vision, and the white stars are a symbol of growth, development, and progress in the homeland of the person with the vision. Dream interpreters have confirmed that blue stars in the dream indicate the entry of joy, pleasure, and success into the dreamer’s life, and the loss of troubles, problems, and difficulties. In which it falls, and the dream is an indication of the coming and semi-sovereignty. In the dreamer’s life. Seeing red stars in a dream indicates the possibility of sadness and misfortunes for the dreamer, as well as falling into intractable problems that are difficult to solve and the difficulty of achieving the goals he wishes to achieve. If the dreamer sees the stars dim and not bright, this warns that the dreamer will get into a big problem or A major disaster or accumulation of debts, or the dream may be an indication that the dreamer is exposed to a major health crisis or the death of relatives. Likewise, seeing innocent stars for a married woman indicates divorce, failure of a romantic life, or exposure to a difficult birth. If the dreamer sees the stars shining in the sky, This indicates a happy and successful life that the dreamer will live soon, and the bright stars show the psychological and emotional stability that the dreamer is experiencing after major problems and crises. Second: Interpretation of star dreams and their colors for a single woman: Dream interpreters have indicated that seeing stars in general in a girl’s dream is not Married women indicate a happy marriage soon, and if the stars are white or blue, this means that the life partner has good morals, follows the teachings of his religion and is compatible with them. His personality: Seeing the stars in red means that she will fall into a great misfortune because of her romantic relationship, or this may be a sign that her lover has betrayed her and that she will be exposed to a psychological crisis followed by feelings of sadness and grief. Fatigue. Third: Interpretation of dreams about stars and their colors for a married woman: Seeing the stars for a married woman is an indication of the stability of married life, and the stars in a married woman’s dream are a symbol of the couple’s ability to achieve their goals and their ability to achieve the goals that they have planned for a long time. It indicates the stability of marital affairs, the academic excellence of the children, and the husband’s earning of money from legitimate and known sources. As for the woman who sees red stars, this means that she is suffering from problems with her husband, or that the children are afflicted with evil or hatred. Fourth: Interpretation of dreams about stars and their colors for pregnant women: Dream interpreters indicated that a pregnant woman who sees stars means that the gender of the baby is male and if she saw

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a sword in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a sword in a dream: The sword is considered one of the most important weapons used in wars in the past, and the interpretation of a dream about a sword varied according to the psychological and social state of the pioneer, and this is what we will learn through this article. Seeing a sword in a dream: Dreaming about a sword in a dream indicates that the dreamer will gain prestige or power, and if this person If a woman sees a sword in a dream, this means that there is a man Beside her, he tries to protect and support her, and he is her only source of safety. Seeing a sword in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a person holding a sword in his hand symbolizes that he will be able to reach a position or power, but if the dreamer pulls the sword in a dream, this means that he will be a leader. Weak. Authority and unable to rule his patron. When the dreamer sees that his wife gives him a sword, this is evidence that God will give birth to a son for him, and God knows best. Seeing a sword in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq explained that seeing the dreamer in a dream holding a sword in his hand with many precious stones , this is a sign that he is a person who always seeks to return the rights to their owners, and if he carries a golden one. This dream shows how weak his character is, based on the fact that gold is a soft metal that cannot be used to make swords. If the dreamer carries a sword with his name written on it, this means that he is a person who maintains his honor and dignity, and if the sword rusts, then the dream is evidence of the dreamer’s cowardice and weakness. Seeing a sword in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a sword in a girl’s dream has many interpretations. The dream can be a sign of her reconciliation at all levels of her life, whether scientific or practical, and this vision can be strong and clear evidence of good morals and good behavior. Among men. If a girl sees that she is holding a sword, this symbolizes her pride and high status among people, and if the sword is next to her, this indicates that she will marry a man who will be her support and security. Seeing a sword in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that her husband gives her a sword as a gift, this means The dream is an indication that she will give birth to a new baby and it will be a child for her husband or offspring. If a married woman sees herself buying a sword, this indicates that she will find a new job that will benefit her and earn her a lot of money. Seeing a sword in a dream for a pregnant woman. Dreaming about a sword in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes that God will bless her With a brave child, but if she sees that the sword is broken, then this dream does not bode well and will lead to the death of her newborn, and God knows that. If a pregnant woman dreams that there is a sword inside her house, this is a sign that she is a beloved person to those around her, especially her husband’s family, and that they always help and assist her. If a pregnant woman sees a sword in a dream but it disappears, then this dream is not worthy of praise because it indicates that she will face some problems.

title: Interpretation of the letter waw and in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the letter W in a dream by Al-Nabulsi, which came from the dreams of people who saw the letter W in a dream, and which the venerable Sheikh Al-Nabulsi brought to it has many connotations and different signs from one person to another, and in reality it tempts the person with what this interpretation leads to, which destroys the morale of those who feel anxiety and fear. This is something that we must explain in our article about the interpretation of the letter Waw and in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Seeing the stake in Al-Nabulsi’s dream: The letter Waw and in the dream, the stake is a symbol that indicates ownership and ability, and the stake appears to the world, and the wooden stake indicates the pretending son, and it also shows fears And sadness. Binding in a dream indicates strength, position, firmness of opinion, and authority to make decisions. It can indicate travel, quitting a job, longevity, marriage, or money. Hitting a stake into the ground or wall indicates marriage to an unmarried young man or the imminent pregnancy of a married woman. God knows best. The face in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: A happy face in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s prosperity in his life and indicates good and happy news. As for seeing a black face, it represents the birth of children, and a yellow face shows envy, humiliation, hypocrisy, or obedience. The disappearance of the flesh of the cheeks in a dream indicates poverty, lack of money, and lack of money. A blue face indicates many criminal acts, and a frightening black face indicates many sins or a sign of sects. And disorder, a large face is a sign of status and balance. A black woman's face in a dream portends the death of her husband. Applying perfume to a woman’s face in a dream indicates stability, a large number of faces indicates the necessity of obedience, and a squeaky face indicates immorality. Mud in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Being muddy in a dream is one of the symbols that indicate exposure to turmoil and innovation. Walking in mud indicates anxiety or fear for the dreamer. Mud in a patient’s dream indicates a long-term illness, and walking in it can indicate disaster, imprisonment, or Persecution. And kneading with mud and mud: sadness, grief, misfortunes, and misfortunes. Clay is a symbol of many animosities, rivalries, and disagreements that arise between the fortuneteller and his family or friends and relatives. Seeing mud in the well means an inheritance of money and a blessing or an indication of the revelation of secrets, and God knows best. Seeing roses in Nabulsi’s dream Roses are a symbol of a respectable person or returning to an absent person. Seeing yourself cutting roses in a dream indicates a lot of love and dignity, and choosing white roses indicates the presence of a beautiful woman. A red rose is a funny woman and a yellow one is sick. Roses indicate separation or trade and work that does not last. A crown of roses in a dream is a sign of marriage, and roses are a sign of the dreamer’s kindness. Joy and happy occasions. Cutting a rose shows anxiety and unpleasant events, and yellow roses indicate illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the letter waw in a dream. The letter waw in a dream also means getting Money. The letter Waw and green in a dream in a dream also indicates the dreamer’s good condition. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that

title: Interpretation of a dream about hills by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hills in a dream Hills means that it is a piece of land and the most important feature of it is that it rises above the ground level and is also characterized by the presence of water or mountains and trees around it and the interpretations that the dreamer has a strong desire to learn, so during this article we will present and present all the information related to the interpretation of a dream about hills in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about hills in a dream by Ibn Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin touched on seeing a hill in a dream in detail, as he stressed that this vision has important connotations and clues, which we will present through the following points: In general, the translator Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a hill in a dream is a good and praiseworthy dream. Which expresses in its entirety and in a clear way the nourishment and goodness of the person who sees it. The dreamer sees a flat piece of land and therefore there is a hill on it. This is an indication that this dreamer will obtain abundant and great sustenance from the world. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is walking on a hill. This is an indication that On his survival and freedom from some of the dangers he is exposed to in his life. In addition, if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is climbing a hill. This indicates his superiority over the clergy. While if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is on a hill of clay, this may be a symbol of obtaining On sustenance and money. While the dreamer sees that he cannot descend from the hill, this indicates death. Interpretation of a dream about hillsSee also: Interpretation of a dream to see in a dream that you are descending on a mountain in detailSeeing a dream about hills in a dream of Imam Nabulsi, and alongside Imam Ibn Sirin, Imam Nabulsi excelled in Clarifying and preparing interpretations of visions and dreams. Imam Nabulsi believes that a hill in a dream is a symbol of the presence of pure and worthy signs. Likewise, when the dreamer sees himself sitting and then resting on a hill. There is no doubt that this dream is an indication that he is approaching and may reach an important place or may reach To great power and status. While if there is a large percentage of dirt and garbage on the hill in the dream. Certainly this dream is a warning bell for the monarch. This is due to the presence of some events and things in his life that are going wrong and not in a good way. Here it should be noted that the dreamer must To review himself first and then correct his mistakes. As for the hill in the dream, it is beautiful and completely clean, as well as free from any bumps or obstacles. Certainly, this dream symbolizes kindness, sustenance, and the good position that the dreamer will reach in his life. Also, if it is spread out and there is a group of Trees as well as green spaces surround the hill. There is no doubt that this dream symbolizes that the dreamer is a generous and generous person. Interpretation of a dream about hills. See also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a plateau in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing hills in a man’s dream. There are many beautiful visions that a person sees in his dream, but their interpretation varies. It ranges between good and good. In this chapter, we will explain the interpretation of a man’s dream of hills in his dream as follows: If a person sees himself in a dream digging in a hill or eating it. This dream is undoubtedly clear evidence that the dreamer is eating forbidden food. It is also what testifies that he can stand

title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about King Salman in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed of King Salman, a dream that made me happy, perhaps because he is one of the figures who carries prestige and everyone wants to get close to him in reality, but what is the meaning of seeing him in a dream, so I searched for a lot until I reached a wide range of interpretations that I will explain in detail through this topic. I dreamed of King Salman, seeing kings. Presidents in a dream have many interpretations that differ depending on the condition of the dreamer and the details of the dream, so through our topic today, let us learn in detail the interpretation of a dream about King Salman bin Abdulaziz in a dream. , as follows: Interpretation scholars believe that seeing King Salman bin Abdulaziz in a dream is one of the visions that indicate abundant livelihood and the acquisition of a lot of capital in the coming period, and God Almighty knows best. It is also said that seeing kings and presidents in a dream is one of the visions that indicate status. High and reaching a prestigious position in current positions. However, if the priest traveled in the dream to see King Salman, this indicates that there are opportunities for the priest to travel in the coming period, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if you see King Salman smiling at him on his own, this indicates Some positive things will happen to him in the coming period, which will make him feel satisfied, happy and cheerful. As for seeing King Salman chasing the dreamer in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will submit his resignation soon. Also, the previous vision could indicate that the dreamer will find a suitable job and apply for it. After taking a break from his old job. Dream interpreters believe that seeing King Salman in a dream means that the dreamer will reach an excellent position in the country. It also indicates getting rid of accumulated fears that make the viewer feel very sad for a long time and also expresses the mood for any problem in life. The viewer faces it during this time. In the event that the dreamer suffers from debts during this period, the vision indicates that he will be freed from these worries in the coming period, because he will obtain a lot of money, livelihood, and many good things. In the event that you see King Salman giving money to the dreamer in a dream This indicates many happy events and circumstances that will happen to the dreamer within a few days. However, if King Salman is overcome by sadness while giving money to the dreamer, this indicates that he will be exposed to many things that make him sad in the dream. Whereas if the dreamer sees in a dream that the King Salman insulted him, it means that he will face problems with the Saudi people and that he will remove all oppression in front of this king. Seeing King Salman in a dream for a single woman. In the context of learning about the interpretations of King Salman’s dream, we learn from this paragraph the most important clues related to the condition of the unmarried girl, as follows: He believes Interpretation scholars say that seeing King Salman in a dream is one of the visions that indicate a relationship between one person, during the coming period, with a successful person who possesses all the qualities that make her happy. Whereas if a girl sees herself marrying King Salman in a dream, this means

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing gypsum in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing plaster in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the forms of adornment that a person adds to his home as well as the place he wants to highlight its beauty, and plaster has been one of the most famous forms in recent times to distinguish and add a lot of grandeur, order and beauty, in addition to seeing plaster in a dream to him Interpretations we will reach in this article in which we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing plaster in a dream for a son. Sirin is special because it is considered one of the most important and famous scholars of dream interpretation. Interpretation of the dream of seeing gypsum in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many people who have these dreams, which are sometimes considered strange, and according to what is stated in dream interpretation books, they have many different meanings, and along these lines We will explain it. Interpretation of the dream of seeing plaster in a dream by Ibn Sirinho also: It should be noted that seeing plaster in a dream is a sign of many good things that will come to the dreamer in the coming period. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a swan in a dream for a married and single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a swan in a dream for a married and single woman, especially since animals and birds are among the things that are often seen in the dreams of many individuals, as they are considered an integral part of human life, and there is no doubt that seeing them in a dream includes many interpretations and interpretations, It varies depending on the details in the dream and the type of bird seen. In these lines, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about seeing a swan in a dream for a married or unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a swan in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It is worth noting that the scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most important and famous scholars of dream interpretation, as he was interested in clarifying the interpretations, meanings and signs that dreams contain, and in this Context: We learn more about the interpretation of the dream of seeing a swan in a dream for a married and single woman. It is also: Seeing a swan in a dream according to what was interpreted by Ibn Sirin. It is evidence of the presence of the judge who judges between people fairly. In addition, seeing a swan in a dream is evidence of the presence of a secret woman in Conversation. Also, if a person sees in his dream that he has caught a swan, then it is considered a praiseworthy dream. As this vision is evidence that the dreamer will overcome all the problems and circumstances that disturb the peace of life. Seeing the killing of a swan in a dream is evidence of the theft of a lot of money. Returning to others and taking people’s money unjustly. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing pebbles and stones according to the most famous translators in detail. Seeing a swan in a dream for a single woman. As for seeing a swan in a dream for a single girl, it is one of the good visions that carry these positive interpretations and good news. From this standpoint, we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing a swan in a dream. For a single woman it is also: If an unmarried girl sees a swan in a dream, it flies in the sky. This vision will be a sign of this girl’s happiness and that she will marry whoever she wants. While the fear of a swan is seen in a dream for an unmarried girl. It is a sign that this girl regrets something. What. Also, if you see in a dream an attempt to catch a swan and you cannot do it. This is evidence of failure in her life and sticking to it indicates success. Whereas, if an unmarried woman dreams that she is killing a swan in a dream. This will be evidence of her injustice to someone in Her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a horse in a dream for a married and single woman. Interpretation of seeing a white swan in a dream, especially since seeing a swan differs in the connotations it contains, based on the color of this animal, which has been explained by many dream interpretation scholars, and in this context we explain to you the interpretation of seeing a swan. White in a dream is also: If you see a white swan in a dream. This is a sign of the bright and prosperous future that awaits the deity. In addition, seeing a white swan in a dream is evidence that a woman does not have the dexterity of speech. Also, a white swan in a dream is a sign On haste and the dreamer’s inability to act appropriately in matters. Also, seeing the wings of a white swan in a dream is a sign of having a lot of money.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing shoes in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing shoes in a dream for single and married women. Dreams related to women were among the things that were of great interest to them, and questions about them also increased from time to time, as the dream of seeing shoes in a dream came to many women, including seeing shoes, where we will go. This article explains the interpretation of a dream about seeing shoes in a dream for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about seeing shoes in a dream for a married woman. Interpretations of dreams in a dream differ according to the personal situation of the viewer, which differ according to the many details contained in the dream, which indicate many connotations. Here are the most important interpretations of a dream about seeing shoes in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is wearing new shoes, this indicates that she is married to someone else. If this woman is seeking a divorce, God will make it easy for her and she will have a righteous husband. Likewise, if a married woman sees herself taking someone else's shoes, this indicates that she will marry someone else after her divorce. However, if a married woman sees that she is wearing shoes given to her by her husband, this indicates that she will be happy in her upcoming married life. Also, seeing a married woman wearing new shoes or buying shoes for children means that she will become pregnant in the coming days. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that losing shoes in a dream is a sign that the dreamer has lost something, whether it is at the level of practice or personal life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a camel eating in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman There are many indications that indicate good news in The dream of an unmarried girl, including seeing a bachelor’s shoe, until the shoe appears in many colors, and the interpretation is based on the color in which the unmarried woman saw it. Her dream and here Seeing shoes in a dream for a single woman: Seeing shoes in a dream is one of the visions that indicate new events, which differ according to the color of the shoe in the dream. Also, if a girl sees that she is wearing shoes, this indicates that the girl heard good news. Because seeing shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her engagement. Also, seeing shoes in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of her future marriage to a person with high morals. Where the vision of receiving H from a known person in a dream of an unmarried woman indicates her engagement through that person. And if he is an unknown person, this is a sign of success in study or work that the single girl will enjoy. This also indicates the marriage of an unmarried woman to a man of social status who brings her happiness in her married life. As for if the unmarried woman sees herself tying her shoes, as Ibn Sirin said, this is a sign of goodness and abundance of livelihood from God and ease in the affairs of her future life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing eating oranges in a dream Interpretation of a dream about seeing shoes in a dream for a pregnant woman There are many signs that go into seeing shoes in a dream, which indicate many indications, as seeing shoes in a dream is a sign

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing pumpkin in a dream by Ibn Sirin by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a pumpkin in a dream according to Ibn Sirin by Al-Nabulsi, and if one sees that he took a pumpkin or gourd from someone, this indicates the expansion of his livelihood and that he will enjoy a high position and position. Among men, if he is in debt, God will pay off his debt, and if he is sick, he will be healed by God’s command. Because there is nothing wrong with seeing raw zucchini and eating it, and it shows hostility and enmity, and it is recommended to eat it cooked, because it indicates recovery from illnesses and illnesses. Follow us to learn about the dream of seeing zucchini in a dream. A dream of seeing a pumpkin for Nabulsi. Seeing a pumpkin in a dream symbolizes prosperity, well-being, and psychological comfort. The interpretation of dreams about buying a pumpkin in a dream shows joy, happiness, and good news. The dream of seeing a large pumpkin in a dream indicates good luck and marriage. The interpretation of seeing green pumpkins in a dream is evidence of an increase in money, a rich life, and many good things. Eating cooked pumpkin in a dream means moving on. To a better place and may indicate travel. Dreaming of seeing pumpkin by Ibn Sirin. Seeing yourself eating cooked pumpkin in a dream is evidence of recovery from illness, disappearance of stress, and freedom from problems. As for seeing uncooked pumpkin in a dream, it means disputes and disagreements between relatives and friends. Interpretation of dreams about cooking Pumpkin in a dream is a sign of reconciliation between people and getting rid of the feeling of loneliness. Seeing pumpkins and watermelon in a dream means recovery from illness. The interpretation of seeing pumpkin seeds in a dream indicates an increase in financial and commercial profits. Seeing selling pumpkins in a dream indicates that the dreamer is religious and follows the Sunnah of the Messenger. God, may God bless him and grant him peace. Seeing a pumpkin in a dream indicates a person who benefits from people such as a scientist, doctor, or lawyer. A dream of seeing a pumpkin for a single woman. Seeing an orange pumpkin for an unmarried woman in a dream means that she will fulfill her desire and bring her a lot of happy news. A dream about buying indicates A pumpkin from the market for an unmarried woman indicates that she will marry someone who suits her, loves her, and cares for her. The interpretation of seeing a cut pumpkin in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates rivalry, separation, and distance from someone close to her. A pumpkin in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the end of tension in her life, and the passage of difficult stages. Eating cooked pumpkin in a dream for a woman indicates comfort and the end of worries and sorrows. Eating raw pumpkin in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates a separation between her and her loved one or indicates suffering, trouble and sadness. Seeing pumpkin in a dream means good luck and good health. Seeing pumpkin In a dream, it signifies wealth, status, and the fulfillment of desires. Pumpkin also indicates recovering from illness, paying debts, gaining money, and relieving stress and anxiety. Dream of seeing pumpkins for a married woman. Seeing a green pumpkin in a married woman’s dream means that she will soon become pregnant. Seeing a married woman cooking pumpkin In a dream, it means marital happiness and stability in her life with her husband. Seeing a pair of large pumpkins in a dream is for a married woman.
